title: Drive Image XML HDD Backup & Copy utility
description:
DriveImage XML : A "Norton Ghost Alternative" ! 

DriveImage XML is a HDD backup and restoration software similar to Norton Ghost. The software enables you create a complete backup image of any drive or partition, You can restore later restore the image to same or another partition, you can also clone a drive to another. The program also includes an image explorer similar to Norton Ghost Image Explorer that lets you explore previously created backup images and extract individual files. Its a 1.61 MB download. 

The program allows you to:
Backup logical drives and partitions to image files 
Browse these images, view and extract files 
Restore these images to the same or a different drive 
Copy directly from drive to drive 
Schedule automatic backups with your Task Scheduler  
Image creation uses Microsoft&#039;s Volume Shadow Services (VSS), allowing you to create safe "hot images" even from drives currently in use.
